entry.def: Someone who is inebriated has drunk too much alcohol.

example.ex: Scott was obviously inebriated by the time the dessert was served.
example.tran: 到了上甜点的时候,斯科特显然已经喝醉了。

means.word_mean: 1. stupefied or excited by a chemical substance (especially alcohol);

auth_sentence.content: More beer, more fatty food, inebriated drivers.

sentences.en: Somebody are often too inebriated to safely travel to their homes.
